Honolulu.KIPO (FM):
KIPO (89.3 FM) is a radio station licensed to Honolulu, Hawaii. The station is owned by Hawaii Public Radio, and airs HPR's classical music programming. KIPO programming is simulcast on sister stations KIPM and KIPH.
On February 14, 2017 KIPO changed their format from HPR's news, talk and jazz service to HPR's classical music service, as part of Hawaii Public Radio's realignment of its program services.
